about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Super Cat Simulator, a fun and whimsical game where you can immerse yourself in the life of a feline adventurer. Explore a vibrant and interactive virtual world as you play as a customizable cat, using your magical abilities to complete quests, discover hidden treasures, and interact with other animals.

In Super Cat Simulator, you can roam freely around Cat Island, discovering new areas and interacting with other animals. Experience the full charm of Super Cat Simulator with its beautifully crafted world, stunning graphics, and a delightful lo-fi soundtrack that perfectly complements the game's whimsical atmosphere.

But Super Cat Simulator is not just about relaxation. Take a break from exploring the vast world of Super Cat Simulator and try your paw at a variety of fun mini-games and challenging activities that are sure to keep you entertained for hours on end. From fishing to treasure hunting, there's always something new to discover on Cat Island.

Unleash your creativity with the ability to dress up your cat with a wide range of outfits and accessories! Let your feline friend reflect your unique style with the ability to customize their outfit and accessories in Super Cat Simulator. From a sophisticated bow tie to a swashbuckling pirate hat, the possibilities are endless!

And that's not all! Super Cat Simulator also includes magical abilities that players can unlock as they progress through the game. From the power of flight to the ability to speak to other animals, there's no shortage of fun and exciting features to explore.

Features:

  • Customizable cats: Choose from a variety of outfits and accessories to create your own unique furry friend.

  • Magical abilities: Unlock new powers as you progress through the game, such as the ability to fly or speak to other animals.

  • Mini-games and challenges: Take a break from your adventures with various mini-games and challenges scattered throughout the world.

  • Lovable characters: Meet other animals along your journey, each with their own personalities and stories to share.

  • Charming lo-fi music: The perfect soundtrack to accompany your whimsical adventures.

Super Cat Simulator is the perfect game for cat lovers and adventure seekers alike. So why wait? Add Super Cat Simulator to your Steam wishlist today and be the first to know when it's available for purchase. Join our community of cat lovers and let's make this game a reality together!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
